Titulo: Physicochemical properties of proton-conducting SmNiO3 epitaxial films

Sentencas: LaAlO3 substrates for systematically investigating the proton transport properties.
Titulo: Physicochemical properties of proton-conducting SmNiO3 epitaxial films

Sentencas: X-ray Diffraction and Atomic Force Microscopy studies reveal that the as-grown SNO thin films have good single crystallinity and smooth surface morphology.
Titulo: Physicochemical properties of proton-conducting SmNiO3 epitaxial films

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity measurements in air indicate a peak at 473 K in the temperature dependence of the resistance of the SNO films, probably due to oxygen loss on heating.
Titulo: Physicochemical properties of proton-conducting SmNiO3 epitaxial films

Sentencas: A Metal-Insulator-Transition occurs at 373 K for the films after annealing at 873 K in air.
Titulo: Physicochemical properties of proton-conducting SmNiO3 epitaxial films

Sentencas: In a hydrogen atmosphere (3% H-2/97% N-2), an anomalous peak in the resistance is found at 685 K on the first heating cycle.
Titulo: Physicochemical properties of proton-conducting SmNiO3 epitaxial films

Sentencas: Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy studies as a function of temperature indicate that the SNO films have a high ionic conductivity (0.030 S/cm at 773 K) in a hydrogen atmosphere.
Titulo: Physicochemical properties of proton-conducting SmNiO3 epitaxial films

Sentencas: The activation energy for proton conductivity was determined to be 0.23 eV at 473-773 K and 0.37 eV at 773-973 K respectively.
Titulo: Physicochemical properties of proton-conducting SmNiO3 epitaxial films

Sentencas: These findings demonstrate that SNO thin films have good proton conductivity and are good candidate electrolytes for low temperature proton-conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells.
Titulo: Physicochemical properties of proton-conducting SmNiO3 epitaxial films
